content.query:
COPY INTO DailySalesCopyCommand
(StoreCode default 'XXXXX' 1, Date 2, TotalSales 3, TotalAmount 4)
FROM 'https://myworkspacetestfiles.blob.core.windows.net/sales/dailysales/*.csv'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Shared Access Signature', SECRET='sp=rl&st=2026-01-29T10:46:34Z&se=2026-01-30T19:01:34Z&spr=https&sv=2024-11-04&sr=c&sig=xGSPjk6IAvdotn6APEt8ha6mMWFX2hBIbxASLrpRcJ4%3D'),
    ENCODING = 'UTF8',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    FIRSTROW=2
)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DailySalesCopyCommand
